sentences.sContent: I had to have extra tuition in maths.
sentences.sCn: 我不得不上数学补习课。

sentences.sContent: ...students pay very little—if any—of their tuition fees back...
...the amount of one year’s tuition and fees...
...Congress has tried to help students with college costs through Pell Grants and other forms of tuition support...
...Filling out these forms consumes 7% of every tuition dollar...
...or asking students even higher tuition payments...
...But a look at the strange variations in tuition reveals that the choice about which college to attend doesn’t come down merely to dollars and cents...

trans.tranCn: 教学， 讲授， 指导； 学费
